content: Great article and good point! What is also happening is that the frame designers work in is often foggy and hard to deal with (not defined scope, john doe users, small budget, narrow time frame…). And of course, everyday we read so much about “best UX practises bla bla” and “ideal projects” that then we feel over-responsible of doing it right. So, we apply things which already exist and work. We don’t dare.
